name: Audio LLM Processor
description:
Ask questions about any local audio file. This tool passes your audio and prompt to a multimodal LLM for analysis.

For long audio files, you might prefer to convert the audio to text first, and the use a LLM on the text.
author: @@official.shinkai

llm_provider.description: Optional default LLM to use. Leave it empty to use the default LLM from the Agent, chat or task. Make sure to use a LLM supporting audio input and processing. Use LLM IDs as displayed in Shinkai (e.g., 'gemini_2_5_pro').

audio_path.description: The path to the local audio file. Use file formats supported by the selected LLM.

llm_override.description: Optional override for the LLM provider. Leave empty to use default. Make sure to use a LLM supporting audio input and processing. Use LLM IDs as displayed in Shinkai (e.g., 'gemini_2_5_pro').
